D-space is here to realize your dreams.

Have you ever dreamed of flying the skies like a bird?

Have you ever dreamed of being a spaceship fighter?

Features

No need to be scared of flight!

Just wear on the pilot goggle we developed and you're ready to fly.
If you happen to be dissy during the flight, just take off the pilot goggle.

Flight Freely!

You can go 500m above the skies, and the range of 2km.
You can fly in the maximum speed of 72kmph.

The Latest Technology!

We are using a echnology called Augmented Reality/Virtual Reality, and Unmanned Aerial Vehicle, to realize your dreams.

SF, Calfornia, United States
